participant_1.background:
I prefer to keep my hair natural, as I like to focus on the food I cook.
i have a severe phobia of wide open spaces.
i hate that my mom made me get braces.
I love growing plants in my greenhouse, but I have to be careful about what I grow because of my asthma.
I now have a new most valuable possession - my library card.

participant_2.background:
I'm close with my parents, but they don't understand my music taste.
I like to cook for my family and friends because it allows me to relax and be creative.
i m a hopeless romantic.
I snuggle up with my cat and read Anne of Green Gables.
I'm not rich, but I'm content with my life and I love spending time with my dog.

content.text: Pretty good. Just relaxing with my dog.
Nice! I'm about to go to the library.
Yeah, I love to read! I just got my new library card and I'm excited to check out some new books.
That's great! I love to cook and I love to read. Do you have any favorite books?
Yes, I love the Anne of Green Gables series. I also really like the Harry Potter series.
Oh, I love Harry Potter too! I've been reading the books to my daughter lately.
That's so cool! I'm sure she loves them.
She does! She's always asking me to read more to her.
That's great! I'm glad she likes them.
Me too! I'm going to go ahead and let her read to me for a bit. It's her turn to read.
